alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Osage; Shawnee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Shawnee, southwestern Douglas and northeastern Osage Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Topeka to 3 miles northeast of Overbrook. Movement was northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Topeka, Carbondale, Tecumseh, Richland, Silver Lake, Overbrook, Clinton, Lone Star, Pleasant Grove, Pauline, Clinton Lake, Globe and Berryton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 347 and 355. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 170 and 191. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
